attributes.action: put petrol and diesel prices to 80p per litre
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the prices for fuel are getting ridiculous

rejection.details: There are many similar petitions, see http://search.petitions.pm.gov.uk/kbroker/number10/petitions/search.lsim?qt=reduce+petrol&sr=0&nh=10&cs=&sc=number10&oq=poverty&sb=0&ha=1157&mt=0
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
